Flash Briefing Skill

Developer Terms of Use
des: Bobbi Baehne, the President of Think Big Go Local, shares daily tips specifically to assist small business owners, managers and entrepreneurs stay on top of trends, techniques, and news in social media, digital marketing, website design, search engine optimization (SEO) and online businesses.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
